name: d3-let
description: A small set of utilities for d3 plugins

scripts.test: eslint index.js src test && babel-tape-runner `find test -name '*-test.js'` | faucet
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs dist/d3-let.js -c -m -o dist/d3-let.min.js && rm -f dist/d3-let.zip && zip -j dist/d3-let.zip -- LICENSE README.md dist/d3-let.js dist/d3-let.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." v${VERSION} && git push --tags
